title: SCI-FI LEVELS 3 (Music Loops for level design)
description: Cerberus Audio's 3rd Instalment of Sci-Fi Levels 3 presents, 10 HD Music asset tracks that loop seamlessly for gaming production all in the key of 80 BPM.
longDescription:
Welcome To SCI-FI LEVELS 3 Game Developer & Production Music Pack! (Music Loops for level design)

The third instalment of Sci-Fi Levels brings you a pack that has been crafted for menu style music & in-game level music, screen titles/background music for your Unreal Project.

🎮

PURCHASES & FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  • When You Buy our products they are formatted in WAV audio files/CUES. Customers have enquired about other formats such as MP3 to which are not available.
  • All Music is downloaded directly from the UNREAL ASSET STORE after Purchase.
  • When we submit to UNREAL ENGINE MARKETPLACE our products are packaged as WAV/CUE
  • See TECHNICAL INFORMATION for more details about our products before buying.

🎮

LISTEN TO SCI-FI-LEVELS 3 HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-levels-3-preview/s-LAs4sOxdMOq
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  All music created for seamless/Smooth audio transitions between levels in your game.
  •  Tempo/BPM 80
  •  Music Loops crafted in a SCI-FI Style for level design/gameplay, Mixed & Mastered/HD Audio

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 40 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-levels-3-preview/s-LAs4sOxdMOq

Important/Additional Notes: Please Email us for customer enquires & additional questions related to our products @ cerberus_audio@outlook.com
